4304190.name: Golyathe
4304190.description:
Game by Ziggity (Zachary Muilenburg)

OVERVIEW:

A dungeon crawling platformer with unlockable moves, weapons, collectables and more. Full combat with large enemy variety. Meet a wide cast of characters who are there to help you with your adventure or cross you on your path. Explore the world and everything hidden underneath, fighting for the strength to succeed!

Explore the future of Belgium, torn down alike the rest of the world. Help the cowering residents build themselves back up and fight against the human-eating, part-mechanical part-corpse Splayors before their full take over. Meet them at their size as the massive Wargolyathe Machine, jepEX, and utilize the tools at your disposal alongside your human friend, Ottilie. Grow stronger, become faster, and do what you can at humanities end.
4304190.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
